amendment.description: To provide funds for the North Dakota Stat School of Science, Bismark State College, and Minot State University.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3544 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3544 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S7383; text: CR S7383) To provide funds for the North Dakota Stat School of Science, Bismark State College, and Minot State University.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3544 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3544 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Dorgan.
